channel.title: [REQ] Virtue [REQ]
channel.description: Many of you have seen TONS of leeches of this source. And the only server that ISNT a leech of this that used the source is Abyss. I was wondering if anyone happens to have the Source, Client, And cache, with NO errors. I need it. And many people try to sell it for tons. It's not worth anywhere near 100 as people try to value it at. One leech of this source is/has to be Kirithium, and PvP Masters. Speaking of PvP Masters, if you have bought the PvP masters current source from "Azan" the main owner of PvP Masters, YOU HAVE BEEN SCAMMED/RIPPED OFF BY HIM. If people wish to find this source, and release a copy of it for free to me. I'd MUCH appreciate it. Thank you. Just so you know. I know Hank & Scott Perretta, the 2 owner's/dev's of the RSPS called Virtue. So don't try anything slick. Thanks! Bye!

item.title: [REQ] Virtue [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Abrax Abrax
item.description:
@Abrax wrote:

Many of you have seen TONS of leeches of this source. And the only server that ISNT a leech of this that used the source is Abyss.
I was wondering if anyone happens to have the Source, Client, And cache, with NO errors.
I need it. And many people try to sell it for tons.
It’s not worth anywhere near 100 as people try to value it at.
One leech of this source is/has to be Kirithium, and PvP Masters.
Speaking of PvP Masters, if you have bought the PvP masters current source from “Azan” the main owner of PvP Masters, YOU HAVE BEEN SCAMMED/RIPPED OFF BY HIM.
If people wish to find this source, and release a copy of it for free to me. I’d MUCH appreciate it.
Thank you.
Just so you know. I know Hank & Scott Perretta, the 2 owner’s/dev’s of the RSPS called Virtue.
So don’t try anything slick.
Thanks! Bye!
